last_episode_to_air.name: Magic in Amsterdam
last_episode_to_air.overview: The fatal stabbing of a psychiatrist during the ritual summoning of a demon pulls Piet and his team deep into the esoteric world of Ritual Magic, where mystical beliefs conceal a wealth of hidden rivalries and dark secrets.

name: Van der Valk
overview: Set against the backdrop of the city of Amsterdam, Piet Van der Valk and his team investigate a series of high-profile cases immersed in the worlds of art, politics, addiction, mysticism and the fashion industry.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Van der Valk and the team return for another compelling series of murder investigations set against the stunning backdrop of Amsterdam.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Amsterdam's famous detective is back. Van der Valk – a streetsmart and unapologetic Dutch detective who navigates the lively and enigmatic city, solving mysterious crimes using astute human observation and inspired detection.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Van der Valk and his team are back to investigate new crimes in Amsterdam. In addition, Van der Valk must deal with an unwelcome past romance as well as find a way to make one of his beloved team members confront their mortality.

episodes.name: Love in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: Set against the backdrop of impending elections, Piet Van der Valk investigates the mysterious deaths of two innocents with no connection to each other. its a puzzle that leads him into the world of art and politics.

episodes.name: Only in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: Van der Valk is contacted following the death of a young woman. The investigation brings him into contact with a nun interested in erotica, a Christian sect and a drug facility with a controversial approach to addiction.

episodes.name: Death in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: When the brutal killing of a fashion vlogger is broadcast live, Piet van der Valk and his team find themselves drawn into investigating the contemporary fashion world.

episodes.name: Plague on Amsterdam
episodes.overview: Dutch detective Van der Valk is called in to investigate the grisly and theatrical murder of a solicitor. As a cryptic note discovered within her jacket alludes to further murders, the race is on to undercover the truth.

episodes.name: Blood in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: When an employee of the Cuypers Diamonds is killed and his body delivered in pieces to the wealthy siblings and heirs to the company, Van der Valk must consider a tale of revenge against the family.

episodes.name: Payback in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: When a promising cellist from a prestigious orchestra dies following an acid attack, Van der Valk has to delve into the city's vibrant but eclectic classical music scene in the search for her killer.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Van der Valk and the team return for another compelling series of murder investigations set against the stunning backdrop of Amsterdam.

episodes.name: Freedom in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: It's a new day and a new dawn as Van der Valk welcomes two new Sergeants to the team - impulsive hotshot Eddie Suleman and technical whizz Citra Li.

episodes.name: Redemption in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: The use of an Indonesian ceremonial sword as a murder weapon takes Van der Valk and the team deep into the world of colonial museum artefacts and the thorny issue of restitution - with an unlikely link to the cold case.

episodes.name: Magic in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: The fatal stabbing of a psychiatrist during the ritual summoning of a demon pulls Piet and his team deep into the esoteric world of Ritual Magic, where mystical beliefs conceal a wealth of hidden rivalries and dark secrets.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Amsterdam's famous detective is back. Van der Valk – a streetsmart and unapologetic Dutch detective who navigates the lively and enigmatic city, solving mysterious crimes using astute human observation and inspired detection.

episodes.name: Safe in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: Van der Valk and his team return to investigate new crimes in Amsterdam. In addition to solving murder cases, Van der Valk has to deal with an unwelcome past romance resurfacing as well as find a way to make one of his beloved team members confront their own mortality.

episodes.name: Hope in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: The team is called in when an environmental campaigner is murdered on the eve of a global conference. One of several potential suspects would appear to be Cobie Stegenga, a famous singer who went missing and is presumed dead. Van Der Valk connects with Cobie's father to find out the truth.

episodes.name: Secrets in Amsterdam
episodes.overview: Van der Valk and the team are called in when a scientist researching a potential breakthrough in the treatment of cancer is found dead. Van der Valk's ex-flame Kalie Tenkers returns to help the team investigate why he was killed and if there is a link to pharmaceutical billionaire Freddie Klink.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Van der Valk and his team are back to investigate new crimes in Amsterdam. In addition, Van der Valk must deal with an unwelcome past romance as well as find a way to make one of his beloved team members confront their mortality.
